item.title: Use tmux as your login shell
item.description: To use tmux as your login shell, use chsh: # list all available shells $ chsh --list-shells /bin/sh /bin/bash /sbin/nologin /usr/bin/sh /usr/bin/bash /usr/sbin/nologin /usr/bin/zsh /bin/zsh /usr/bin/tmux /bin/tmux # select login shell $ chsh --shell /usr/bin/tmux
